snippet: Reigning champion Serena Williams ramped up the power to beat fifth seed Maria Sharapova for the 18th match in a row and reach the semi-finals of the Australian Open 6-4 6-1 on Tuesday....
lead_paragraph: Reigning champion Serena Williams ramped up the power to beat fifth seed Maria Sharapova for the 18th match in a row and reach the semi-finals of the Australian Open 6-4 6-1 on Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: Serena Maintains Hold Over Sharapova to Reach Semi-Finals
headline.main: Serena Maintains Hold Over Sharapova to Reach Semi-Finals
